channel.title: CVE Feed for zionbuilder.io -- WordPress Page Builder – Zion Builder
channel.description: The latest CVEs for zionbuilder.io -- WordPress Page Builder – Zion Builder

item.title: CVE-2024-30444|2024-06-04T17:39:09.509Z -- zionbuilder.io -- wordpress%20page%20builder%20%E2%80%93%20zion%20builder
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in zionbuilder.Io WordPress Page Builder – Zion Builder allows Stored XSS.This issue affects WordPress Page Builder – Zion Builder: from n/a through 3.6.9.
